name: monitor-server
description: Ping my development server and email me if it is running (in case I forgot to shut it down when not in use)
author: Cooper Labinger

scripts.build: rm -rf lib/ && mkdir lib/ && cp package.json config.json index.js lib/.
scripts.deploy: yarn run build && gcloud functions deploy mainPubSub --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-topic monitor-server --source=lib/
